Noun: a number or letter indicating quality (especially of a student's performanc)
a written form of a musical composition; parts for different instruments appear on separate staves on large pages
a number that expresses the accomplishment of a team or an individual in a game or contest
the facts about an actual situation
an amount due (as at a restaurant or ba)
a slight surface cut (especially a notch that is made to keep a tall)
a resentment strong enough to justify retaliation
the act of scoring in a game or sport
a seduction culminating in sexual intercourse
Verb: make small marks into the surface of
get a certain number or letter indicating quality or performance
assign a grade or rank to, according to one's evaluation
